entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
